docs.snippet: Touchscreen chip maker Synaptics Inc reported lower-than-expected first-quarter revenue and profit, hurt by weak demand from smartphone makers, sending its shares down 13 percent in extended trading....

headline.main: Synaptics Hit by Weak Demand for Touchscreen Chips for Smartphones
headline.print_headline: Synaptics Hit by Weak Demand for Touchscreen Chips for Smartphones

docs.lead_paragraph: Touchscreen chip maker Synaptics Inc reported lower-than-expected first-quarter revenue and profit, hurt by weak demand from smartphone makers, sending its shares down 13 percent in extended trading.

docs.snippet: An airplane and a helicopter collided in midair near a Maryland airport before crashing into trees Thursday, killing three men in the helicopter but sparing two in the plane who deployed a parachute to slow the aircraft's descent before it hit the...

headline.main: Official: 3 Dead, 1 Hurt in Maryland Air Crash
headline.print_headline: Official: 3 Dead, 1 Hurt in Maryland Air Crash

docs.lead_paragraph: An airplane and a helicopter collided in midair near a Maryland airport before crashing into trees Thursday, killing three men in the helicopter but sparing two in the plane who deployed a parachute to slow the aircraft's descent before it hit the trees.

docs.snippet: Talking to kids about personal safety is like talking about retirement planning. We can’t expect them not to play the game to win—so if heading the ball puts kids in danger, then soccer has to change the rules....

headline.main: Looking at Soccer's Concussion Risk, and Asking It to Change

docs.abstract: Talking to kids about personal safety is like talking about retirement planning. We can’t expect them not to play the game to win—so if heading the ball puts kids in danger, then soccer has to change the rules.

docs.snippet: The United States on Thursday agreed to maintain wartime control of South Korean troops in the event of an attack by North Korea for the foreseeable future, delaying the transfer of authority to Seoul that had been scheduled for 2015....

headline.main: US, SKorea Agree to Delay Wartime Control Transfer
headline.print_headline: US, SKorea Agree to Delay Wartime Control Transfer

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States on Thursday agreed to maintain wartime control of South Korean troops in the event of an attack by North Korea for the foreseeable future, delaying the transfer of authority to Seoul that had been scheduled for 2015.
